info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:47PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...Showers and isolated thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern eastern Hood River and far southeastern Skamania Counties through 815 PM PDT... At 744 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a possible thunderstorm just east of Parkdale, or 11 miles south of Hood River, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Brief heavy downpours and penny sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hood River, Odell, Parkdale and Underwood. In Washington this includes State Route 14 between mile markers 61 and 63. This includes the following highways in Oregon... Interstate 84 between mile markers 61 and 68. State Highway 35 between mile markers 79 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
